AbilityScoreFeature.Name: Ability Score Increase
AbilityScoreFeature.Text: Your Charisma score increases by 2, and your Wisdom score increases by 1.

MultiFeature.Name: Legacy of Phlegethos
MultiFeature.Text: You know the friends cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the charm person spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the suggestion spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.
